item.title: Install OKD on Hetzner Cloud
item.description: Inspiration from Installation of OKD 3.10 from start to finish Create a Hetzner VM with the CLI https://github.com/hetznercloud/cli hcloud (Hetzner CLI) # Let’s check first some hcloud command that we can use later to create a VM with the right size and in the Datacenter we want. hcloud server create --name <YOUR_DOMAIN> --type <SERVER-TYPE> --image <IMAGE> --ssh-key <YOUR_HETZNER_SSH_KEY> --datacenter <DATACENTER> Server Type # hcloud server-type list ID NAME CORES MEMORY DISK STORAGE TYPE 1 cx11 1 2.
